page.title: 06LOCAL NEWS:THURLASTON
page.content: During the month of June 1985 there were several entries from Thurlaston in the Village News section of the Rugby Advertiser.The entry for June 13th told us "Thurlaston Ladies Club held their annual coach outing on June 3rd-a gloriously sunny day."They visited Lichfield and Langton for a tour of the John Beswick factory (pottery producers)and a visit to Gladstone Pottery Museum. The entry for June 28th mentioned that "The University of Warwick is arranging a Course on local history,Â£Thurlaston Past and Present'to be held in the village hall." People in Thurlaston get most of their local news from newspapers,but also from radio,television,gossip and the Church magazine.
